availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, gardner. Ohio native. Married to Ophelia Troutwine Wolf on November 3, 1851. Father of Albert Wolf, Anna Wolf, Charles Wolf, and George Wolf. Gardener in Kenton County in 1850.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 55; Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 127, p. 37; Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Boone County, Kentucky, November 3, 1851; KYR-0001-029-0543.
